ideas.title: Eerie Footprints
ideas.summary: An invisible entity that leaves muddy or bloody footprints behind.

ideas.title: Graveyard Structure
ideas.summary: Graveyard or cemetery structures. Disturbing a grave may cause the undead to rise up and attack the player.

ideas.title: Moths
ideas.summary: Moth mobs that fly around at night. They are attracted to lanterns and may extinguish them. Comes in a variety of colors and designs.

ideas.title: Phantom Tools & Armor
ideas.summary: Possessed armor or tools that come to life and attack the player.

ideas.title: Bone Piles
ideas.summary: Piles of bones that can reassemble into a skeleton when a player gets near.

ideas.title: Scarecrow
ideas.summary: Scarecrow that boosts nearby crop growth. Maybe they come to life if they are struck with lightning.

ideas.title: Cursed Bookshelves
ideas.summary: A bookshelf block that sometimes play creepy whispering sound effects, as if the books are speaking to the player.

ideas.title: Wolf Creatures
ideas.summary: Different types of wolves based on legends like Black Shuck, Hellhounds, skeletal dogs, etc.

ideas.title: Scraps of Lore
ideas.summary: Scraps of paper or old books with lore and ghost stories written in them.

ideas.title: Screenshot Entity
ideas.summary: An unsettling entity that is invisible to the player but can be seen in screenshots.

ideas.title: Invisible Ink
ideas.summary: Invisible ink for signs. The text is only visible if you use or hold a certain item.

ideas.title: Cursed Compass
ideas.summary: A cursed compass that leads you towards the nearest hostile mob instead of spawn. Could be put in loot and players would not know it's a different item.

ideas.title: Motion Entity
ideas.summary: An unsettling entity that players can only see while they are standing still.

ideas.title: Possessed Book
ideas.summary: A book that slowly writes new pages on its own. Things like creepy messages, reference things the player did, or give them coordinates or advice to lure them somewhere.

ideas.title: Tree Tapping
ideas.summary: A tree tap block that allows players to collect various types of saps and syrups like maple syrup.

ideas.title: Smores
ideas.summary: A campfire cooking recipe for making classic smores.

ideas.title: Mushroom Rain Boost
ideas.summary: Make mushrooms grow after it rains. This could be making mushrooms spread when it rains, or adding new types of mushrooms that only appear after a rainfall.

ideas.title: Fall Decorations
ideas.summary: Decorations that fit with the fall aesthetic, like harvest baskets, scarecrows, and acorns

ideas.title: Ghost Structures
ideas.summary: A structure that completely disappears when the player leaves

ideas.title: Faceless villagers
ideas.summary: Villagers that have no face. This could be a temporary unsettling thing, permanent, or maybe entire villages of faceless villagers.

ideas.title: Ocean Shadows
ideas.summary: Massive shadows under the surface of the water to create the illusion that something is down there.

ideas.title: Angler Fish
ideas.summary: A mob inspired by the angler fish that lures players into the depths of the ocean.

ideas.title: Ghost Ships
ideas.summary: Abandoned ship structures that can be found in the ocean. Maybe they have ghost pirates or similar creepy mobs.

ideas.title: Face Collector
ideas.summary: An unsettling entity or mini-boss that collects the faces/skins of players it has killed.

ideas.title: Navigation Disruption
ideas.summary: A mob that makes navigation items fail. Compasses point at it instead of spawn, clocks show the wrong time, and maps display fake markers.

ideas.title: Grinning Mobs
ideas.summary: Humanoid mobs like players or villagers that have unnaturally big smiles.

ideas.title: Bermuda Triangle Biome
ideas.summary: An ocean biome with thick fog, weird lights, and subtle effects that disrupt navigations like turning boats slightly off course.

ideas.title: Cute Witchcraft
ideas.summary: A witchcraft mod that focuses on the cute aesthetic rather than the dark and morbid stuff. Stuff like Kiki's Delivery Service, cute animal mages, cozy cottage core witches.

ideas.title: Potion Minigame
ideas.summary: A new brewing system with a puzzle based minigame.

ideas.title: Friendly Ghosts
ideas.summary: Friendly ghosts that help the player out, kind of like the Allay. They could scare off raiders, help find items, or help you fly temporarily.

ideas.title: Witch Familiars
ideas.summary: Different kinds of familiars that players can collect. Each one gives the player a different buff.

ideas.title: Potion Expansion
ideas.summary: A wide range of new potion materials and new types of potions. Lots of interesting and niche potion ideas.

ideas.title: Candy
ideas.summary: New types of candy items. Bonus points for original and creative designs.

ideas.title: Enchanted Postcards
ideas.summary: Enchanted postcards that let the recipient teleport to the location it was taken.

ideas.title: Green Rain
ideas.summary: Unsettling green rain that makes plants grow faster, maybe mutating them. Based on the green rain in Stardew Valley.

ideas.title: Ambient Birds
ideas.summary: Spooky birds that add ambient cawing to the world. Maybe they go after crops or can be tamed.

ideas.title: Nether Portal Spread
ideas.summary: Nether portals slowly spread corruption into the real world and need to be contained.

ideas.title: Face Changer
ideas.summary: A hostile mob that changes facial expressions each time you look away from it.

ideas.title: Spider Lairs
ideas.summary: A spider lair full of egg sacs, mobs encased in webs, and a giant spider boss.

ideas.title: Fairy Circles
ideas.summary: Rings of mushrooms that grow in the forest. Stepping in one may teleport you away.

ideas.title: Moth People
ideas.summary: Small humanoids with visual elements inspired by moths. They could be like villagers or piglins and trade with you.

ideas.title: Creepy Fog Event
ideas.summary: A heavy fog weather event that causes weird sounds to play, and new types of hostile mobs to show up. Like in The Mist.

ideas.title: Cursed Light Sources
ideas.summary: Light sources like lanterns and torches that attract hostile mobs and cause them to spawn more instead of repelling them.

ideas.title: Scarecrow Mob
ideas.summary: A scarecrow inspired mob that moves during night and turns into a block during the day.

ideas.title: Ancient Crypts
ideas.summary: Giant crypt structure that generates under ground.

ideas.title: Monster Repellent
ideas.summary: Tools and equipment for detecting, preventing, and containing spooky things.

ideas.title: Dark Deals
ideas.summary: A villager that offers valuable items in exchange for lowering the players maximum hp.

ideas.title: Blood Moon
ideas.summary: A rare blood-moon event that makes mobs stronger and drop more items. Some mobs may only spawn during this.

ideas.title: Candle Magic
ideas.summary: Candle based magic. Things like summon mobs, give buffs, or reveal nearby invisible mobs.

ideas.title: Abandoned Structures
ideas.summary: Abandoned structures, like run down theme parks or empty villages.

ideas.title: Repeating Staircase
ideas.summary: A mysterious staircase or structure that teleports the player to appear infinite.

ideas.title: Pumpkin Golems
ideas.summary: Different kinds of golems that wear pumpkins on their heads.

ideas.title: Pumpkin Boss
ideas.summary: A giant pumpkin boss with vine tentacles that lash at players and push them away.

ideas.title: Bio-Tech
ideas.summary: A tech mod that uses flesh, organs, and body parts, instead of machinery. For example, a crusher that uses teeth and hearts that pump fluids.

ideas.title: Ghostly Mobs
ideas.summary: Ghosts, wraiths, and spectres! Souls of the dead that roam the lands. Maybe they can give the frightened debuff, preventing you from using items or attacking temporarily.

ideas.title: Zombie Tropes
ideas.summary: Various types of zombies, pulling inspiration from common zombie tropes. Like Crawlers which are fast, explosive zombies, etc.

ideas.title: Skeleton Lumberjack
ideas.summary: Skeleton Lumberjack who lurk in the forrest. They come in an assortment of colors, and have a special axe that can fell trees quicker or use less durability on logs.

ideas.title: Headless Mobs
ideas.summary: Headless mobs, like the headless horseman who has a pumpkin in place of their head.

ideas.title: Poltergeists
ideas.summary: Dark spirits that lurk in caves and attack by levitating nearby blocks and objects and tossing them at the player.

ideas.title: Vampires
ideas.summary: Vampires, bat-winged creatures who hunt at night and hate the daylight. Would heal from attacking and can use a sonic wave attack like the warden.

ideas.title: Mummies
ideas.summary: Mummies, bandaged undead mobs that roam sandy biomes at night. Maybe they can stretch their arms or release toxic clouds. Lighting them on fire could turn them into vanilla husks.

ideas.title: Turkeys
ideas.summary: Add turkeys as an ambient mob to forests.

ideas.title: Rats
ideas.summary: Rats and vermin that eat your crops and lurk in dark areas. Maybe include mouse traps to deal with them.

ideas.title: Night Birds
ideas.summary: Peaceful night birds like owls that make hooting sounds.

ideas.title: Pumpkin Creatures
ideas.summary: Pumpkin creatures like Jack O' Lantern mimics, crawling pumpkin spiders, and maybe even actual pumpkin people who have a secret society and want you specifically to be deceased?

ideas.title: Wisps
ideas.summary: Ghostly flames called wisps that drift through forested biomes at night. Maybe they come in different colors that do different things inspired by coices of the void.

ideas.title: Living Armor
ideas.summary: Living suits of armor that stay still at day and move after dark. Maybe they are part of a new structure or use a new type of weapon like spears.

ideas.title: Tric-or-Treaters
ideas.summary: Trick-or-treaters, humanoid creatures dressed in costumes. Bring them candy or sweets for a reward. Maybe there is also a trick variant that tries to harm you, or play a trick on you.

ideas.title: Abandoned Farmhouse
ideas.summary: Old farmhouse structure with barns, ruined crops, scarecrows, and fall themed crops like gourds or corn.

ideas.title: Undead Structures
ideas.summary: Graveyards, crypts, catacombs, and similar structures with grave robbing potential. Maybe undead skulk through at night.

ideas.title: Gothic Castles
ideas.summary: Large gothic castles or haunted medieval fortresses, maybe they are strongholds for mobs like vampires.

ideas.title: Abandoned Campfires
ideas.summary: Campfires with log seats, tents, and maybe other camping items. The campsite is abandoned and it looks like they left in a hurry.

ideas.title: Haunted Mansions
ideas.summary: A haunted mansion filled with ghosts, deathtraps, and puzzles!

ideas.title: Creepy Decorations
ideas.summary: Creepy decorations like broken mirrors, creepy paintings, mannequins, worn down furniture, dolls, torture devices, placeable blood splatters, placeable books, bones, eerie statues, webs.

ideas.title: Pumpkin Moon Event
ideas.summary: A recreation of the pumpkin moon event from terraria.

ideas.title: Spooky Candy
ideas.summary: Gather weird or spooky ingredients to make your own candy at a confection station.

ideas.title: Ancient Hellhound Boss
ideas.summary: A mini-boss inspired by the Ancient Hellhound from Ultima Online.

ideas.title: Yokai
ideas.summary: A mod inspired by Japanese yokai like the Karakasa, a one-eyed hopping umbrella monster.

ideas.title: Spooky Cosmetics
ideas.summary: A bunch of hats and cosmetics that can be used as halloween costumes. Maybe there is a special merchant who sells costumes or a goodie bag that can be found in chests.
